content: crochet scarf pattern easy-peasy design includes hook and yarn suggestions 1 ball of adriafil cubicol yarn color ocher 87 and 1/2 ball of sirdar jewelspun yarn - color sandstone sunset 0708 crochet abbreviations in standard u s terms full written pattern a basic knowledge of crocheting is necessary skills level easy this crochet pattern has been tested by testers size of ready-made scarf length 200 cm 80 in width 25 cm 20 in this is a crochet scarf pattern for english speaking users the pattern is a pdf file which will be available for downloading immediately after purchase some crocheting tips ✔ make more repeats to make it longer it is too easy ✔ make sure you have enough yarn 1 ball of jewelspun requires 2 balls of cubicol ✔️ use other color mixes to make your unique piece this pattern is copyright and designed by veselunka please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images in part or in whole you are welcome to sell the items that you make using the pattern there is no refund on my patterns i will do my best to help if you have any questions along the way simply message me and i would be more than happy to assist you if you get stuck happy crocheting
